body.name: Playlearn 300pc 8" Building Straws and Connectors - Wheels and Special Connectors Included - Full Size Straws - Kids Building Toys - Stem Toys for Preschool
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs 31 mins
features: ENDLESS POSSIBILITIES: With 300 pieces of straws, connectors, and wheels this straws and connectors builders set offers limitless building opportunities for kids, allowing them to unleash their creativity and imagination.

SAFE AND DURABLE: These construction straws are made from premium quality and non-toxic materials making this set is safe for children to play with. The straws are sturdy and can withstand rough play, ensuring long-lasting fun

DEVELOPS COGNITIVE SKILLS: This straw builders set is not just a fun toy, but also an educational one. It helps improve hand-eye coordination, problem-solving, and spatial awareness skills in children.
GREAT FOR GROUP PLAY: This stem toy set is perfect for group play and encourages social interaction and teamwork among children, making it an excellent choice for playdates, classrooms, or parties.

INCLUDED IN SET: Set includes 8-inch full-size straws, unlike our competitors who have half-size straws in their sets, 4 large & 4 medium wheels, multicolored connectors, special connecting clips, and a storage box.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Playlearn Building Straws with Wheels - 816 Pieces Playlearn Building Straws with Wheels - 300 Pieces Playlearn Nuts and Bolts Toy for Kids - 64 Pieces Playlearn Pipe Tube Toy for Kids - 128 Pieces Playlearn Hexiflex Interlocking Toys - 1250 Pieces Amount of Pieces 816 300 64 128 1250

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the classroom
reviews.reviewText: I used these for a team building activity with high school students and they loved it! They created some amazing structures and were very engaged. I love the clear container as it is easy to see the items and the beautiful colors. Easy to take apart and put away....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy for groups of kids
reviews.reviewText: Got this straw game for a Bible study group with lots of kids. The whole group, kids ages 2-9, sat quietly building things with these while they listened to the story. They are easy to build. They fit snug and stay together. So many possibilities. The straws are sturdy yet flexible enough to form curves. My three year old loves them. Highly recommend. We even gave a set to our cousins for Christmas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a TAB art room
reviews.reviewText: I am building the architecture center in my TAB Teaching for Artistic Behaviors art classroom and this set was the perfect addition. It's easy for both K4 learners and for bigger hands to create cool things. The case is durable and easy to open. And the colors are so lively and fun. I may buy another set soon just to build something even bigger!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Didn't disappoint! Great toy for kids!
reviews.reviewText: We ordered this set to accompany a 750 piece set that we had from a few years ago because our 11 year old and 6 year old wanted to make larger builds. This set definitely met our expectations and the children love the addition of the wheels too. I would definitely recommend this toy to anyone with preschool or school aged children. Lots of opportunities to be creative and have fun. ☺

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Purchased for morning STEM Bins
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these for use in morning STEM bins. They are one of my student's favorites. The pieces have held up well, they can be combined to create a variety of projects and the amount received for the cost is perfect. We would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great productI gifted this to my niece and she loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars STEAM BIN Must-HAve
reviews.reviewText: I use this item with students as a way to enhance learning with creativity. I also use it as an activity for early finishers and earned free time. My students beg to use them at some point every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, great value
reviews.reviewText: Love that it came with a storage container
Ce jeu est un « must » a avoir en classe. Les élèves aiment y jouer. Il permet également de stimuler leur imagination. Bref, je le recommande !
Like: Variety and qualityProbably hard for a younger child to work out what they're looking at.

reviews.reviewTitle: My 4 children, loved them years ago.
reviews.reviewText: My 4 children, loved them years ago. This is a requested suggestion, from my daughter, for our Granddaughter. I'm sure she will love them, as well as my 4 children lived them.

Was not happy with the product at all. Came almost after a month of ordering it. Very cheap plastic. Very expensive for something that is worth less. So sad that I order it. Just wasted more than 50$ on something that worth way less.
